Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've decided to get a little deeper into the world IR in my saves, but was wondering if there was a telescoping corridor or gangway part in any mod?

If not, would someone be able to assist?  The idea would be to utilise the stock texture for the structural fuselage, with a 1.25m ends, but thicker so that the when the part is fully extended it bulges out then back in to the 1.25 node.

The idea for such a part would be to create our own rotational habitats that will still be able to start within a stock fairing, and then once in space then extend out.

 

Peace.
